actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that, by January 1, 1998, States should eliminate the use of cash for payment of welfare benefits.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that, by January 1, 1998, States should eliminate the use of cash for payment of AFDC (Aid to Families with Dependent Children), and instead provide AFDC through an electronic transfer of funds into an account accessible to the AFDC recipient only through a State issued debit card with photo ID.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that, by January 1, 1998, States should eliminate the use of cash for payment of welfare benefits.
